entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchBar: Execute SearchCommand when .Text == "" #8994
  • Use Blazor Hybrid with own rendering/interaction pipeline #8993
  • ScrollView Does Not Work When Inside A VerticalStackLayout #8990
  • Reconcile all NET7 //TODO Add this API comments #8989
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Exception thrown: 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException' in Microsoft.Maui.dll #8988
  • Move all "SLNS" that are only relevant for CI or specific scenarios to a separate folder #8987
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TabBar buttons won't return from a pushed page in Android. Works in iOS. #8986
  • How do I Pin a Maui App to a specific version? #8985
  • Preview Update for 17.3.0 Preview 4 Really hosed my MAUI install #8984
  • Incorrect X coordinate of clicking on an element inside the Shell.FlyoutHeader #8976
  • iOS does not display/update page content if ContentPages are not inside same directory as App/AppShell #8974
  • There isn't a toggling event for switch #8973
  • BoxView BackgroundColor always gray #8972
    6.0-servicing
  • Two radio buttons in group - set is checked of one of them in run time not worked #8971

Closed

  • There is no way to set the text color of a Switch control #8965
  • MAUI Image not render in Android #8991
  • Can't find global resource dictionary #8799
  • Ran out of trampolines of type 0 running on iPhone iOS 15.5 simulator #8970
  • The RuntimeIdentifier 'ios-arm64' is invalid. #7765
  • Button IsEnabled does not restore visual state #8932
  • [Android] Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7885
    6.0-sr3
  • Shape / Geometries Bindable Properties not working #8530
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo "SpaceAroun" in FlexEnumDesignTypeConverters #8983
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22369.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22373.2 #8982
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.4.1.2 to 2.5.0 #8981
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.4.2.1 to 2.5.0 #8980
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.4.2.1 to 2.5.0 #8979
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.4.2.1 to 2.5.0 #8978
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.2.1 to 2.5.0 #8977
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Android] Fix Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7926
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • Invalidate Path if something in a PathFigure or PathGeometry changes #8533
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Exclude `global.json` from iOS Bundle Resources #8724
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Non shell aot #8941
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat internal until .NET 7 #8930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
